# react-gif

React port of [x-gif](http://geelen.github.io/x-gif/)

## Installation

```
npm install react-gif
```

## Demo

http://cezary.github.io/react-gif/

## Example

```javascript
var React = require('react');
var Gif = require('react-gif');

var Component = React.createClass({
  render: function() {
    return (
      <Gif src={url} />
    );
  }
});
```
